name: ProcoreOauthRuby
description: A barebones sinatra app that can authenticate via oauth and make some basic api calls.

PROCORE_CLIENT_ID.description: The third party app oauth client id provided by Procore

PROCORE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The third party app oauth client secret

PROCORE_OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URI.description: url for this application that will receive the oauth authorization_code callback, usually https://{app_name}.herokuapp.com/callback
